TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LoginViewDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件呈现其模板由是否用户登录到托管网站，并包含登录的用户帐户的角色之一。The control renders one of its templates, determined by whether a user is logged on to the host Web site, and the roles that contain the logged-on user account. 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源代码，介绍了控件进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 在切换到源视图时，设计时控件的标记源代码持久保存，并编辑到 Web 页的标记。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 类提供设计时支持控件。The class provides design-time support for the control. 属性返回对象，它通常包含一个对象，派生自继承树中每个级别的设计器的类。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. 属性返回的模板的关联的模板组集合控件。The property returns a collection of template groups for the templates of the associated control. 属性始终返回`true`，，该值指示设计器创建关联的临时副本控件来生成设计时标记。The property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 类方法提供了以下功能：The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法返回用于呈现关联的标记控件在设计时。The methods return the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time. 方法获取在当前模板未定义时的设计时呈现关联控件的占位符的标记。The method gets the markup that renders a placeholder for the associated control at design time when the current template is not defined. 方法提供了在发生错误时的设计时呈现关联的控件的标记。The method provides the markup that renders the associated control at design time when an error has occurred. - 方法将返回关联的当前模板的序列化的副本控件。The method returns a serialized copy of the current template for the associated control. 方法从控件模板的序列化副本设置关联控件的区域。The method sets a region of the associated control from a serialized copy of a control template. - 方法准备设计器，以查看、 编辑和设计关联控件。The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control. 对关联控件的更改时调用方法。The method is called when there is a change to the associated control. 方法用于移除属性、 添加其他属性，或者隐藏关联控件的属性。The method is used to remove properties from, add additional properties to, or shadow properties of the associated control. ## Examples 以下代码示例演示如何扩展类，以更改外观和行为的控件派生自控件在设计时。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance and behavior of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 该示例从`MyLoginView`控件从。The example derives the `MyLoginView` control from the . `MyLoginView`是一份控件。The `MyLoginView` is a copy of the control. 该示例还从`MyLoginViewDesigner`类派生类，并应用特性`MyLoginViewDesigner`上`MyLoginView`控件。The example also derives the `MyLoginViewDesigner` class from the class and applies a attribute for the `MyLoginViewDesigner` on the `MyLoginView` control. `MyLoginViewDesigner`控件重写以下成员：The `MyLoginViewDesigner` control overrides the following members: - 方法，使属性中可见**属性**网格在设计时。The method to make the property visible in the **Properties** grid at design time. - 方法，以便绘制控件以使其更容易看到周围橙色边框。The method to draw an orange border around the control to make its extent more visible. - 方法来生成标记为包含错误消息，从而以红色呈现时，占位符粗体文本。The method to generate the markup for a placeholder that includes the error message, which is rendered in red, bold text. - 方法来生成标记为包含为控件定义的角色组的名称的占位符。The method to generate the markup for a placeholder that contains the names of the role groups that are defined for the control. - 方法会引发异常，如果不是关联的控件`MyLoginView`对象。The method to throw an exception, if the associated control is not a `MyLoginView` object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在内部构建的新实例类创建关联时控件或该控件在设计图面上的副本。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置的关联模板索引控件重新创建到当前的设计时索引，然后会导致关联的控件和数据绑定子控件，如有必要。The method sets the template index of the associated control to the current design-time index, and then causes the associated control to recreate and data bind its child controls, if necessary. 下一步，调用基方法来生成标记。Next, the calls the base method to generate the markup. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法的类中继承自类，以更改由派生的控件的外观在设计时类。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 该示例将绘制控件以使其更容易看到周围橙色边框。The example draws an orange border around the control to make its extent more visible. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#4)]

span.para: 如果重写方法，则一定要调用基方法，因为它最终，通过几个重写后，调用上控件或控件来生成标记的副本。
If you override the method, be sure to call the base method because it eventually, through several override levels, calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建对象的模板编辑区域在可视化设计器图面，然后初始化它作为模板。The method creates an object for a template editing area on the visual designer surface, and then initializes it as a template. 如果未定义模板，则显示一个字符串，会提示你单击此项可开始编辑。If no templates are defined, a string is displayed that prompts you to click to begin editing. 预定义的常量用于生成返回的标记。A predefined constant is used to generate the returned markup. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法的类中继承自类，以更改由派生的控件的外观在设计时类。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 该示例将绘制控件以使其更容易看到周围橙色边框。The example draws an orange border around the control to make its extent more visible. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#4)]

span.para: 这重载不会调用其基方法或控件来生成标记。
This overload does not call on its base method or the control to generate the markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果模板实现接口可从此`region`参数，方法返回持久化的模板。If a template implementing the interface can be obtained from the `region` parameter, the method returns the persisted template. 否则，它会调用基方法来生成的内容。Otherwise, it calls the base method to generate the content. 序列化的模板可以还原到控件中的使用方法。The serialized template can be restored to the control by using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法首先设置指定的关联的当前模板的名称的字符串消息控制，还指定了该模板为空。The method first formats a string message that specifies the name of the current template of the associated control and also specifies that the template is empty. 然后生成标记为包含该消息的占位符。Then the generates the markup for a placeholder containing that message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法的类中继承自类，以更改由派生的控件的外观在设计时类。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 该示例生成标记为包括所有的名称的占位符为关联控件定义的对象。The example generates the markup for a placeholder that includes the names of all the objects that are defined for the associated control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 错误设计时控件呈现为包含类型名称、 控件名称，以及公告和描述该错误消息的面板。The error design-time control renders as a panel that contains the type name, the control name, and messages announcing and describing the error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法的类中继承自类，以更改由派生的控件的外观在设计时类。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 该示例生成为一个占位符，包括错误消息，从而以红色、 粗体文本呈现标记。The example generates the markup for a placeholder that includes the error message, which is rendered in red, bold text. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可视化设计器调用方法时它已准备好使用设计器来呈现控件。The visual designer calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control. 和其基方法配置属性，并设置所需的设计器的操作的事件。The and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. `component`参数是与此设计器或一份相关联的控件控件。The `component` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写继承自的类中方法类，以更改由派生的控件的行为在设计时类。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the behavior of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 本示例将引发，如果不是关联的控件`MyLoginView`对象。The example throws an , if the associated control is not a `MyLoginView` object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 时调用方法关联的事件控件执行。The method is called when the event of the associated control executes. 通常情况下，这是为了响应属性更改控件上 (例如，**属性**网格更改)。Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change). 如果控件模板发生更改时，**属性**刷新网格。If the control template is changed, the **Properties** grid is refreshed. 验证当前模板索引是否有效，并且随后调用基方法。The verifies that the current template index is valid, and then calls the base method.

summary.span: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

span.span: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器使用派生自方法来隐藏相应的设计时属性在设计器实现，使用的各种控件属性和将属性添加到或移除属性**属性**网格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 方法适用的属性属性使其不显示在**属性**网格。The method applies the attribute of the property so that it does not appear in the **Properties** grid. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写继承自的类中方法类，以更改**属性**网格控件派生自的在设计类时间。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the **Properties** grid of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 示例使属性中可见**属性**网格。The example makes the property visible in the **Properties** grid. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#3)]

span.para: 重写方法来添加属性、 从中删除属性或更改设计时属性集合中的属性的特性。请务必调用基方法，然后再执行其他处理。

Override the method to add properties to, remove properties from, or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection. Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将分析相关联的序列化的模板由指定的控件`content`参数，然后使用该模板将更新指定的控件的区域属性`region`参数。The method parses a serialized template for the associated control that is specified by the `content` parameter, and then uses the template to update the region of the control that is specified by the property of the `region` parameter. 当前的模板可以使用序列化控件方法。The current template of the control can be serialized using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取对象从基属性，，然后添加对象，包含单个匿名模板 （这对应于在没有用户登录），对象的登录的模板，以及每个中的元素关联的集合控制对。The property gets a object from the base property, and then adds objects that contain a single object for the anonymous template (which corresponds to no user logged on), for the logged-on template, and for each element in the collection of the associated control to the . 返回此给调用方。The returns this to the caller.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为属性始终为`true`，在设计器属性返回的关联副本控件来生成设计时标记。Because the property is always `true`, the designer property returns a copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 属性创建副本，方法持久保存的实际控件，然后分析保持的控件字符串。The property creates the copy by persisting the actual control, then parsing the persisted control string. 复制的控件不会影响实际的任何持久性。The copied control does not affect any persistence for the actual . 如果属性已被重写以返回`false`，在设计器将使用关联控件本身来生成设计时标记，并对控件的设计时更改将保存到在页标记源。If the property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated control itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control will persist to the page markup source.

span.para: 您可以重写属性返回或以确定其值，该值基于该控件会使用类级别的标记是否属性。如果未重写会忽略。
You can override the property to return or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class level attribute. If the is not overridden, the ignores the .
